theory SumOfSqr2
  imports Main
begin

lemma sum_of_sqr2: "x * x + y * y ≥ 2 * x * y" for x y :: int
proof -
  have "(x - y)^2 ≥ 0"
    by simp
  also have "(x - y)^2 = x^2 - 2*x*y + y^2"
    by (simp add: power2_diff)
  finally have "x^2 - 2*x*y + y^2 ≥ 0"
    by this
  then have "x^2 + y^2 ≥ 2*x*y"
    by simp
  thus ?thesis
    by this
qed

end
